website_summaries.verdict: Raw subwoofer bass response at an affordable price. The best deal for those on a budget.
pros: Dust cap helps ventilate dual voice coils
cons: Speakers could blow out if amp is not controlled

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money and time!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 4 of these speakers with the warranty and when my husband hooked them up 2 of them blowed mins later, so we contacted amazon we were told to call the manufacturer which they told us they don’t honor anything that’s bought through amazon. So then we had to contact squaretrade which the warranty was through they had us ship them the speakers then was told they can’t fix them do to overload but we found that to not be true cause the other 2 are still playing. So I advise you not to purchase these and the warranty is bull crap. SAVE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: PJones

customer_reviews.title: The sub size is a little big for most 15" ...
customer_reviews.text: The sub size is a little big for most 15" boxes, I had to sand away some of the wood from the box's hole just to get this to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Drehkraft1

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Owned this for years, loved every day. Also had a 12” hooked up next to it. There’s definetly better out there, but I wouldn’t hesitate to buy it again. Ended up selling when having a baby. Never hooked up a amp big enough to max it out, ran the boss riot 2000w max I believe.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great Subs!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 15 mofo and man, my got some great bass. I have a 3000watt boss amp 2 ch AB. I bridged it and have it at full range mode. Sounds great. Im gonna need a better amp. Gets real hot, bought a fan it works. When buying 2 subs, make sure you get a vent sub box.. its a must
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: only last for short time
customer_reviews.text: 2nd sub I had to buy after so long sub starts to pop at random and smell, should have gotten a warranty I don't think I'll buy this again
customer_reviews.author: doug Shurelds

customer_reviews.title: Great sub, hit really good in my truck
customer_reviews.text: Great sub, hit really good in my truck. I'm super happy with is speaker
customer_reviews.author: Cody lennex

customer_reviews.title: I have 2 of these in my Silverado and they ...
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these in my Silverado and they pound at the proper wattage. I'm a little scarce to attempt True watts though. Max true watts I would push is about 1100-1200 per sub. Definitely no more.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon H.

customer_reviews.title: nice sub
customer_reviews.text: Hits really hard but always remember break them in first
customer_reviews.author: James brannan

customer_reviews.title: It is a little bigger then most but no complaints
customer_reviews.text: I have had one in my car for 4 year now and its amazing I dont have any complaints in the time I have had it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: mid bass is not existant
customer_reviews.text: good product, hits hard powering 2 with 3500w in a custom box no mid bass though
customer_reviews.author: tyler

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Slamsssi have two 15s its crazy make sure u have a great amp and the power in your electrical system or the amp will cut off fast deliverys comes when it say it does buy it
customer_reviews.author: Tre B

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Although these woofers are meant for car audio, I purchased 4 of them for home theater use; I can say they perform very well. If you are looking for a bargain deal for real bass output, you can't go wrong with these woofers.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Mofo 15's!!!
customer_reviews.text: These subs are just amazing, I have two of these on a 2500 watts rms amp and I could not be more satisfied. These are definitely the best bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: leo

customer_reviews.title: Power Acoustic MOFO-154X is  a BA MOFO
customer_reviews.text: This Sub sounds amazing in my Malibu. Built a 4 cubic foot ported box and pushing it with one channel on a Boss Phantom PT3000. The lows are great and hits harder then almost any two 12's I've heard. Considering giving up my entire trunk to add another. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am overwhelm with my speaker's thank you very very much.I'm liking these speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Charles pryor

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: No where near 3000 watts it blew on 2000 watts only 1000 watts rms and it was up in smoke
customer_reviews.author: leon matthews

customer_reviews.title: BASS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm running one of these in a single cab f250 on a power acoustic 5150 amplifier and it bumps HARD to say the least. I'm actually very surprised how inexpensive it was. I highly recommend this sub to anyone looking to upgrade their car audio. I'll be adding a few more in the future once I get motivated to build a blow through subwoofer enclosure.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Znutss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these in a 4th order bandpass box and they sound incredible
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: godly
customer_reviews.text: i have two mofos and they hit hard. sounds great u deff need a big amp to push two. and get a dual vent box sound great also
customer_reviews.author: jcurl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are the best sub woofers I have ever had thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy peoples

customer_reviews.title: recommend this sub
customer_reviews.text: i bought this to replace my two 12" in audiobahns have this wired to 2ohms off a 3000 watt amp have it in a 4 cubic foot ported box in a 97 astro VAN and it slams its knocked my sliding door door panel off way better than the audiobahns i had:-)
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M. Schaffer

customer_reviews.title: best woofer for $
customer_reviews.text: For the money the only speaker next ahead of the mofo is the Orion competition ,and you will pay 3x as much for 1 step up. Only reason i gave a 4 Star rating bcuz it no longer comes in wooden box.
customer_reviews.author: 8ight6ix

customer_reviews.title: Booooo!!
customer_reviews.text: 1200 rms, bs for real, these subs arent the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: tim dixon

customer_reviews.title: Because BASS...
customer_reviews.text: Loved these subwoofers.. i purchased 2 with the dual 4 ohm.. the speakers pound massively. I made a custom 4th order box. Iv never owned bass like the one these speakers produce. A must buy if on budget or want to experience massive bass. Highly recommended for your bass needs.. going to get 2 more for a total 4 with a taramps hd8000 amp.. cheers
customer_reviews.author: Herbert H.

customer_reviews.title: loud is an understatement
customer_reviews.text: These speakers will stand anything you put them through. Easy to install but they are huge so the box has to be perfect to the dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Bramel

customer_reviews.title: Just like my other two 124x
customer_reviews.text: They pound!! Just like my other two 124x...great budget buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Carlton Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The have such a good sound quality thus hit extremely hard my friends throats were numb when they I was done they are clear as s*** I'm building a competition vehicle so I need more
customer_reviews.author: josh mize

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great and I'm not the type of guy to right reviews... Got it a day early
customer_reviews.author: durie cody

customer_reviews.title: great at first
customer_reviews.text: They worked great for about a week and then they blew out. I had them hooked up to a 5000 Watt Boss Phantom and I guess they couldn't take it. Very disappointed about that but hopefully my warranty covers it and I can get back to enjoying them.
customer_reviews.author: hooride74

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sound great in custom box too restricted in amazon boxes
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: might need to get some ear muffs with these mofos
customer_reviews.text: got two of these in the back of my suv with a 3200watt hifonics amp an i think im developing a hearing problem definitely 100% satisfied with these i dont think i would ever go with any other subs ever again afters hearing these mofos
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker beats hard I'm pushing it with 1500 watt EXILE amp Hits sososo hard
customer_reviews.author: David Correa

customer_reviews.title: BOOM!!!!👍👍👍
customer_reviews.text: If you want that heavy hitting deep base, this is the thumper for you. With the right size vented box the base is deep and crisp. I've had mine for over a year and it's still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: vergil case

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sub!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 12" MOFO and now this 15". These subs are the best I've had and they are rebuildable which you don't usually get for this low of a price.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bad ass sub! love it makes my whole car shake
customer_reviews.author: flavio diaz

customer_reviews.title: Thumper
customer_reviews.text: This subwoofer is loud af. I had it paired with a boss 5000 and dang it thumps.
customer_reviews.author: Datdog

customer_reviews.title: Vary surprised, I have a jl audio 1100 watt ...
customer_reviews.text: Vary surprised, I have a jl audio 1100 watt RMS amp running it. The JL amp will push this sub to distortion. But there is no need to push that hard. It has a vary clear and tight sound, hits hard real hard, for the price you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bogan

customer_reviews.title: The sound that comes out this speaker is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: As always Power Acoustik never fails. The sound that comes out this speaker is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome

customer_reviews.title: how are these subs?
customer_reviews.text: are these some hard hitting subs anybody?I just purchased 2 of them and just trying to see how just I hook them up for them to beat extremely hard
customer_reviews.author: Taimon P.

customer_reviews.title: Great bass
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these and they are Overall Incredibly great speakers. Outstanding bass and great appearance. Very loud and scared me the first time my husband turned them up it was so loud and my hair was bouncing. See pictures for speakers in custom built box.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy James

customer_reviews.title: 1700 RMS
customer_reviews.text: 1700 RMS nothing else needs to be said. I have 2 in a custom built box with my amp on 25% (6000w demon series), and they beat hard!!!! Had to tighten front grill because it was shaking. They require a lot of air space for 2 so i would only use 1 in a car
customer_reviews.author: Ct

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good but..
customer_reviews.text: First one I got is defective, one of the coils seems to be blew out of shape, replacement is on the way, so hopefully better luck with that one .. but on a good note, it still sounds pretty good with one coil acting up!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: power acoustik mofo 154x
customer_reviews.text: at first i was skeptical about this sub, i got it in the mail and man was it heavy, ive had it for over 6 months now and my plan was to get 2 so i could wire them to 1 ohm but just one wired at 2 ohms is really impressive, i have it on a crappy boss 1100 watt amp thats way over rated and it still makes everything in my truck rattle.... i have a new ssl 4000 watt amp on the way for it so ill be back to review it again when i get everything hooked up, id gladly recommend this to anyone wanting a good budget system, its a great product, just power hungry
customer_reviews.author: chase brown

product_meta.title: Power Acoustik MOFO-154X MOFO 15-Inch Dual 4-Ohm VC 3000 Watt Pro Subwoofer, Standard Packaging
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Standard PackagingNew MOFO woofers have a composite sandwich poly/paper cone that includes a dustcap with aluminum stiffeners. This eliminates cone flex and eliminates cone flex during low bass and high excursion. This new dustcap also cools the high efficiency voice coil! Cast aluminum basket and increased bottom octave output, this woofer is louder in all the right places!
feature_bullets: 2.5" Dual 4-Ohm 4-Layer Voice Coil, Royal Blue Finish with Diamond Cut Accents, Die Cast Aluminum Voice Coil Heatsink
Non-Pressed Pulp Cone, Polyether Foam Surround
Nickel Plated 8ga Compression Wire Terminals, Dual Poly-Cotton Spiders, Die-Cast Aluminum Frame, Vented Pole Piece

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars106 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
